verses.verse: Praise to God for His Salvation and Judgment Praise the LORD! (Lev. 10:3; Eph. 2:17) Sing to the LORD a new song, And His praise in the assembly of saints.
Let Israel rejoice in their Maker; Let the children of Zion be joyful in their (Ps. 33:3) King.
(Judg. 8:23; Zech. 9:9; Matt. 21:5) Let them praise His name with the dance; Let them sing praises to Him with the timbrel and harp.
For (Ex. 15:20; Ps. 81:2) the LORD takes pleasure in His people; (Ps. 35:27) He will beautify the humble with salvation.
Let the saints be joyful in glory; Let them (Ps. 132:16; Is. 61:3) sing aloud on their beds.
Let the high praises of God be in their mouth, And (Job 35:10) a two-edged sword in their hand,
